info.name: MediRemind API
info.description: Complete Postman collection for the MediRemind backend. Each folder groups endpoints by functional module with role and auth notes.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication, password reset, and social login endpoints.

request.description: Register a new patient, doctor, pharmacist, or admin account.
Authenticate a user and receive JWT + cookie.
Clear the authentication cookie for the current session.
Trigger a 6-digit reset code email.
Verify the OTP sent to the user email.
Submit the code plus new password to finish the reset flow.
Protected route for logged-in users to rotate their password.
Exchange a Google ID token for an application session.

item.name: Users
item.description: Authenticated profile management plus family connection flows.

request.description: Return the authenticated user's profile, role, and linked data.
Update profile fields and optionally upload an avatar using multipart form data.
Invite another user (typically a relative) to share medicine plans.
Accept or reject an incoming family connection request.
Fetch confirmed family connections for the logged-in user.
View incoming connection requests awaiting action.
Break a family link so their plans are hidden again.

item.name: Doctors
item.description: Doctor discovery, slots, dashboard, and nested reviews.

request.description: Doctor-only stats for appointments, patients, and reviews (requires doctor role).
Public doctor search with keyword and specialization filters.
Detailed doctor profile used on the provider detail screen.
List available slots for a doctor on a specific day.
Public list of patient reviews scoped to a specific doctor.
Patients can leave a review for a doctor they visited.
Doctor creates an available slot (must be approved doctor).
Doctor lists every slot they created.
Remove an unused slot from the doctor's calendar.

item.name: Appointments
item.description: Booking lifecycle for both patients and doctors.

request.description: Patients select a doctor slot to confirm an appointment.
Patient's upcoming and past appointments.
Doctor view of today's and upcoming bookings (requires approved doctor).
Doctor marks an appointment as completed after consulting.
Patient or doctor can cancel with an optional reason.

item.name: Pharmacies
item.description: Nearby search plus pharmacist-managed store profile.

request.description: Public endpoint returning pharmacies ordered by distance.
Pharmacist creates/updates their store profile.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "City Care Pharmacy",
  "managerName": "Alex Pharmacist",
  "address": "500 Market St, SF",
  "lat": 37.7749,
  "lng": -122.4194
}

item.name: Medicines (Patient)
item.description: Legacy patient-only medicine reminder controller mounted at /medicines.

request.description: Patients define a medicine reminder plan.
Return all active medicine reminders for the patient.
Convenience endpoint to show only meds scheduled for today.
Modify timing, dosage, or instructions for a plan.
Remove a medicine reminder plan permanently.
Create a medicine plan using the new medicinePlan controller.
Return plans created via the new controller.
View plans belonging to an accepted family member.
Update plan metadata or schedule fields.
Delete a plan created under the new controller.
Patient confirms they took or skipped a scheduled dose.
Summary of taken/missed meds for a specific day.

item.name: Orders
item.description: Patient ordering flow plus pharmacist dashboards.

request.description: Patient submits an order to a pharmacy including delivery info.
Patient order history with statuses.
Pharmacist view of orders targeted to their store.
Aggregated stats for a pharmacist's business dashboard.
Pharmacist updates an order status (pending, accepted, delivering, delivered, cancelled).
Admin-only KPIs for the control panel.
Paginated list filtered by role for moderation.
Approve doctors or toggle any user's active flag.

item.name: Reviews
item.description: Standalone review endpoints also mounted under /doctors/:doctorId/reviews.

request.description: Public list of reviews regardless of doctor context.
Alternative endpoint to create a review by providing doctor reference in body.

item.name: Notifications
item.description: Notification center actions for any role.

request.description: Fetch unread and read notifications for the logged-in user.
Mark a single notification as read.
Bulk mark every notification as read.
Send a text or image message between two users.
Inbox-style list ordered by most recent activity.
Retrieve the full conversation between the authenticated user and another participant.
